name: Bullet Hell John
description:
my first game ever. It was made with python to help me learn. WASD to move any mouse button to shoot. walking into the edges makes you reappear on the other side. enemies occasionally drop powerups. powerups have a chance to be speed, fire rate, or health.

I will make updates to unfinished art.

This is my first game so, please provide feedback in the comments on ways I could improve.
